name: Eaze Solutions LLC
description: Operator of a cannabis software platform and marketplace intended to offer on-demand medical marijuana delivery services. The company's platform verifies the patient's medical marijuana eligibility and connects adult consumers with licensed dispensaries and products, enabling users to have safe access to legal cannabis medical marijuana via a mobile device.
one_liner: Operator of a cannabis software platform and marketplace intended to offer on-demand medical marijuana delivery services.
